concept.title: Export data
concept.shortdesc: To keep a backup of data TEST2 relating to nodes, packages, or containers, download a CSV file that contains the same information as the page you are currently viewing, including all filter selections.

conbody.p:
To download resource data as a .csv file, click ======= Export dataLorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.Eamonn Smith <eamonn.smith@puppet.com>
To download resource data as a .csv file, click >>>>>>> e6cf64ebe68a459c2c65bb302c0f978b60d81f5d Export. The filename is <ui_page>_<timestamp>.csv, for example pd_export_nodes_2019-06-17_1054.csv.
